sect2.title: iAdorn
sect2.para: adorn is the parser recognized symbol for this operator. adorn may apply any column definition to any column in a view. This includes adding to, modifying, or overriding the column definitions that may exist on the columns of the underlying tables. The underlying tables are not affected by the use of adorn.

example.title: Example
example.programlisting: create view TempView SomeTable adorn { ID { default 0 } } ; // changes the default to zero regardless of what the default is on the base table.
